title: 装工业2错误，求原因，里面有错误代码
txt_content:
我装了modloader,modloaderMP,Forge，反正一系列基本mod，然后把ic2那个zip压缩包放到mods就错误

ModLoader 1.2.5
mod_MinecraftForge 3.0.1.75
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.2.5v1
mod_BrewGuide 1.0
mod_CraftGuide 1.4.3 for Minecraft 1.2.3

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5


ModLoader 1.2.5
mod_MinecraftForge 3.0.1.75
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.2.5v1
mod_BrewGuide 1.0
mod_CraftGuide 1.4.3 for Minecraft 1.2.3

我该吐槽什么好……craftguide是1.2.3的…… forge好像也不是1.2.5的……能不崩溃吗

sylqiuyifeng 发表于 2012-8-31 08:45 
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
好吧 你吐死我吧。我是在mcbbs下载的- - 上面说好的1.2.5

replies.txt_content:

但是工业我看不到版本……怀疑是forge的版本不对
